altername_name: Dan Diamond is Lost in Space
name: Lost in Space
overview: A text adventure; the sequel to Franklin's Tomb and the second game in the Dan Diamond Trilogy. The final game, Fishy Business never made it to the BBC Micro. In this outing Dan is trapped aboard a derelict space ship that's patrolled by security robots and his task is to find his way to the bridge and take control of the ship.
